name: Functional Test Case Template
description: Template for functional test cases in healthcare applications

structure.title: Test [functionality]
structure.description: Verify that [functionality] works as expected according to requirements
structure.expected_results: [Functionality] should work without errors and produce the correct output

placeholders.[functionality]: The specific functionality being tested, e.g., 'patient registration'
placeholders.[screen/page]: The relevant screen or page in the application
placeholders.[action]: The user action to perform, e.g., 'click submit button'
placeholders.[test_data]: The test data to use, e.g., 'valid patient details'
placeholders.[expected_behavior]: The expected system response, e.g., 'patient record is created'
The expected system response or outcome

patient_registration.title: Test Patient Registration Functionality
patient_registration.description: Verify that patient registration works correctly with valid data
steps: Enter valid patient details: John Doe, 01/01/1980, Male
patient_registration.expected_results: Patient should be registered successfully with a unique patient ID

test_data.input_data: First Name: John, Last Name: Doe, DOB: 01/01/1980, Gender: Male
